Septoplasty.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

partial inferior middle turbinectomy.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

KTP laser.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

sinus endoscopy.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

maxillary antrostomies.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

removal of tissue.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

partial ethmoidectomy.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

Chronic sinusitis.context: Operative Diagnoses: Chronic sinusitis with deviated nasal septum and nasal obstruction and hypertrophied turbinates.

deviated nasal septum.context: Operative Diagnoses: Chronic sinusitis with deviated nasal septum and nasal obstruction and hypertrophied turbinates.

nasal obstruction.context: Operative Diagnoses: Chronic sinusitis with deviated nasal septum and nasal obstruction and hypertrophied turbinates.

hypertrophied turbinates.context: Operative Diagnoses: Chronic sinusitis with deviated nasal septum and nasal obstruction and hypertrophied turbinates.

adequate anesthesia.context: The patient was taken to the operating room. After adequate anesthesia via endotracheal intubation, the nose was prepped with Afrin nasal spray.

Afrin nasal spray.context: The patient was taken to the operating room. After adequate anesthesia via endotracheal intubation, the nose was prepped with Afrin nasal spray.

Xylocaine.context: 1% Xylocaine with 100,000 epinephrine was infiltrated in both sides of the septum and the mucoperichondrium.

epinephrine.context: 1% Xylocaine with 100,000 epinephrine was infiltrated in both sides of the septum and the mucoperichondrium.

prominent tissue.context: There was some prominent tissue and just superior to this, the anterior ethmoid was opened.

anterior ethmoid.context: There was some prominent tissue and just superior to this, the anterior ethmoid was opened.

maxillary sinus ostium.context: The 45-degree forceps was then used to open the maxillary sinus ostium. This was enlarged with backbiting rongeur.

backbiting rongeur.context: This was enlarged with backbiting rongeur.

mucosa.context: The tissue found in the ethmoid and maxillary sinus were removed and sent to pathology and labeled as left maxillary sinus mucosa.

anterior area.context: This mucosa was then removed from the anterior area.

ostium.context: The maxillary sinus ostium was then opened with 45-degree forceps.

submucosal resection.context: Protecting the eyes with wet gauze and using KTP laser at 10 watts, the sinus endoscope was used for observation and the submucosal resection was done of both inferior turbinates as well as anterior portion of the middle turbinates bilaterally.

swelling.context: This was to open up to expose the maxillary ostium as well as other sinus ostium to minimize swelling and obstruction.

obstruction.context: This was to open up to expose the maxillary ostium as well as other sinus ostium to minimize swelling and obstruction.

spur.context: The incision was made with a #15 blade Bard-Parker knife. The flap was then elevated, overlying the spur that was protruding into the right nasal cavity.

saline solution.context: After this was laid back in position, the nasal cavity was irrigated with saline solution, suctioned well as well as the oropharynx.

Surgicel.context: Surgicel with antibiotic ointment was placed in each nostril and sutured outside the nose with 3-0 nylon.

antibiotic ointment.context: Surgicel with antibiotic ointment was placed in each nostril and sutured outside the nose with 3-0 nylon.

3-0 nylon.context: Surgicel with antibiotic ointment was placed in each nostril and sutured outside the nose with 3-0 nylon.
